title: The Best Beauty Advent Calendars of 2024 (So Far)
description: Fall has only just arrived, but that doesn’t mean we’re not already looking ahead to what this year’s holiday season will have to offer. (That is, if you’ve been good this year.) And while it may feel early — after all, Halloween is two months away — that hasn’t deterred brands from releasing some of their big-ticket holiday items. Case in point: Beauty-stuffed advent calendars.While these blockbuster sets usually come at a premium price point, that's for a few reasons: They tend to be limited in quantity, feature exquisite packaging, and contain myriad products, including full sizes or limited-edition shades. All that's to say that the beauty-filled advent calendars you'll find here are not only marvelous to ooh and aah at but also provide a surprisingly good value, given the ample contents inside. (Pro tip: Find a buddy to go halfsies with and divide the spoils.) And while advent calendars are inherently an exercise in patience, we won't tell if you open up all the teeny-tiny doors the day it arrives on your doorstep...At Refinery29, we’re here to help you navigate this overwhelming world of stuff. All of our market picks are independently selected and curated by the editorial team. All product details reflect the price and availability at the time of publication. If you buy or click on something we link to on our site, Refinery29 may earn commission. For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter. Kiehl's 12 Mini Advent-Ures Gift SetKiehl's advent calendar is always one of the most popular sets of the gifting season, and this year is no exception. For $99, you can try $169 worth of Kiehl's classics, like Crème de Corps, Lip Balm #1, Creamy Eye Treatment, among many others.Kiehl's 12 Mini Advent-Ures Gift Set, $, available at Ulta BeautyDermalogica The Advent CalendarFor the aspiring aesthetician, Dermalogica's festive calendar is jam-packed with professional-grade skincare to get you glowing into the new year. Dermalogica The Advent Calendar, $, available at DermalogicaKylie Cosmetics Holiday Advent CalendarFor Kylie Cosmetics' advent calendar, the brand is serving twelve days of glam in the form of the brand's fan-favorite products: Plush lip oils, blush sticks, liquid lipsticks, and much more.Kylie Cosmetics Holiday Advent Calendar, $, available at Kylie CosmeticsRevolve Beauty 2024 Advent CalendarRevolve is perhaps best known for as a destination for party-ready fashion, but don't sleep on the retailer's beauty offerings. Case in point? This seriously stacked advent calendar, which includes a mix of full- and travel-size products from luxury brands like Dr. Dennis Gross, Elemis, Supergoop!, and more.Revolve Beauty 2024 Advent Calendar, $, available at RevolveVoluspa 12 Day Candle Advent CalendarWhen else but during the holiday season can you get 12 mini candles in one glorious box set? Unboxing them may last be fleeting, but hours of scent will take you all the way to 2025.Voluspa 12 Day Candle Advent Calendar, $, available at SephoraLaneige Manifest Glow: Best of Laneige SetCalling all K-beauty lovers: This dewy set of Laneige favorites includes six full-size and six mini versions of Laneige’s bestsellers. (If you're a fan of the brand's iconic Lip Sleeping Mask, you'll be pleased to hear that this advent calendar contains three different flavors to choose from.) Laneige Manifest Glow: Best of Laneige Set, $, available at LaneigeCharlotte Tilbury Beauty Treasure Chest Of LoveCharlotte Tilbury's advent calendar is always one that sells out — and fast. Don't miss out on getting this collectible heart-shaped treasure chest featuring drawers of glamorous makeup and skincare.Charlotte Tilbury CHARLOTTE'S BEAUTY TREASURE CHEST OF LOVE, $, available at Charlotte TilburyBeekman 1802 There's No Place Like Home Advent CalendarBeekman 1802's advent calendar features over $400 worth of goat milk-infused skincare, but also comes with a storybook starring (you guessed it) an adorable billy goat as they adventure back home for the holidays.Beekman 1802 There's No Place Like Home Advent Calendar, $, available at Beekman 1802Augustinus Bader The 12 Days of BaderI don't know many people willing to spend upwards of $600 on skincare, but if you are: This calendar is the way to do it. Augustinus Bader's first-ever advent calendar is filled with full- and travel-sized products, all powered with the brand's proprietary TFC8 complex.Augustinus Bader The 12 Days of Bader, $, available at Augustinus BaderAnthropologie Holiday Collection Beauty Advent CalendarAnthropologie's famed beauty calendar just dropped, and it might be the best one we've seen yet from the retailer. For just under $100, you get over $300 worth of products from all your favorite brands: First Aid Beauty, Supergoop, Nest, Elemis, among other storied company.Anthropologie Holiday Collection Beauty Advent Calendar, $, available at AnthropologieOlive & June 25 Days Of Mani MagicOlive & June's 2024 nail advent calendars just dropped — and are better than ever. Don't miss out on snapping up these jam-packed sets (one for Christmas and another for Hanukkah) of all things cuticle care, polish, stickers, and more.Olive & June 25 Days of Mani Magic Calendar, $, available at Olive & JuneOlive & June 8 Nights of Mani Magic Calendar, $, available at Olive & JuneDior Le 30 Montaigne Dior Beauty Advent CalendarIn a sea of beauty advent calendars, this $750 Dior version is a true work of art. The packaging is inspired by the maison's historic flagship at 30 Avenue Montaigne, and features a mix of Dior makeup, skincare, fragrance, and more.Dior Beauty Le 30 Montaigne Dior Beauty Advent Calendar, $, available at DiorBenefit Cosmetics Advent Calendar 2024We can always count on Benefit to dream up a whimsical take on holiday sets, and this year’s blockbuster advent calendar (reimagined as a shopping basket) is chock full of all your Bene-faves. Encased in 24 mini boxes, you’ll find a mix of full-size and miniature mascaras, blushes, lip tints, skincare, and much, much more.Benefit Cosmetics The Gorgeous Grocer, $, available at HSNLa Mer Advent Calendar 2024If you really want to knock the socks off of the skincare-obsessed friend on your list (maybe that’s you!), look no further than this La Mer advent calendar. With $720 worth of product inside, the lucky recipient is all but bound to enter 2025 looking as radiant as ever.La Mer The World of La Mer 12-Day Advent Calendar, $, available at Saks Fifth AvenueDiptyque Limited Edition Advent CalendarRevel in the spirit of Noël with Diptyque's made-in-France candles, body care, fragrances, which include something for everyone.Diptyque Limited Edition Advent Calendar, $, available at Neiman MarcusMaison Margiela Advent CalendarMaison Margiela Advent Calendar, $, available at SephoraSephora Collection Premium Advent CalendarThe destination for all things beauty knows a thing or two about gifting, so it's no surprise that Sephora's knocked it out of the park with its very own advent calendar. Featuring Sephora Collection faves, this gift set is chock-full of high-quality makeup and skincare at an accessible price point.Sephora Collection Premium Advent Calendar, $, available at SephoraLush Advent Calendar 2024​​Calling all Lushies: If you love nothing more than taking a gorgeously scented, candy-colored bath, then Lush’s advent calendars (yes, there are two this year) are for you. The High Street version (named after Lush’s first-ever store at 29 High Street in Poole, England) has 25 delightful bath goodies that bring the magic of Christmas to your tub. Then, there’s the Lush Advent Calendar, encased in a reusable trunk so you can restock it with anything from jewelry to makeup. Featuring eleven products that you’ll only find in the advent calendar (including fan faves from past holiday collections), this unique set is sure to encourage some much-needed self-care this holiday season.Lush Advent Calendar, $, available at LushLush 29 High Street Christmas Advent Calendar, $, available at LushThe Body Shop Advent Calendar 2024 Another beloved British bath brand (say that five times fast!) is The Body Shop, whose jam-packed advent calendar is filled to the brim with body butters, shower gels, and soaps galore. Plus, at just under $60, it's among the more affordable ones you'll find this season.The Body Shop Holiday Beauty Advent Calendar, $, available at AmazonL'Occitane 24 Days Of Beauty Advent CalendarGetting anything from French beauty brand L'Occitane is always a treat, but perhaps even more so when unboxed from a visually stunning advent calendar. Inside this luxe set, you'll find several full-size products alongside minis of the brand's most bestselling beauty treasures.L'Occitane 24 Days Of Beauty Advent Calendar, $, available at SephoraBobbi Brown Dazzle & Glow 12-Day Bestsellers Advent CalendarMakeup artist Bobbi Brown is known for her mastery of glowy, natural beauty — and this festive set includes everything you need to achieve her signature look: Multi-dimensional blush, skin-care minis, creamy eyeshadow sticks, and more.Bobbi Brown Dazzle & Glow 12-Day Bestsellers Advent Calendar, $, available at NordstromLiberty London Advent Calendar 2024If you can’t hop on a flight to Heathrow this holiday season, this advent calendar from Liberty London is the next best thing. Not only is the packaging utterly divine, but there’s over $1,500 (!) worth of luxury products inside from brands like Augustinus Bader, Byredo, and Sunday Riley among others.Liberty London The Liberty Beauty Advent Calendar 2024, $, available at Liberty LondonNeiman Marcus It doesn't get more fancy-pants than Neiman's, right? Indulge in the best of the best with this advent calendar featuring a mix of full- and miniature treasures from Augustinus Bader, Sisley-Paris, and many others.Shop Neiman MarcusNeiman Marcus Beauty Holiday Advent Calendar 2023, $, available at Neiman MarcusElemisThis skincare advent calendar is bursting at the seams with $749 worth of luxe products from British beauty brand Elemis, making it the ultimate gift for the beauty lover on your list.Shop ElemisElemis First Class Skincare Advent Calendar, $, available at ElemisSaks Fifth Avenue"A" is for Augustinus Bader, "B" is for Barbara Sturm, "C" is for Clé de Peau...is there any bougie brand left out of Saks' impossibly posh beauty advent calendar?Shop Saks Fifth AvenueSaks Fifth Avenue Saks 25 Days Of Beauty Advent Calendar, $, available at Saks Fifth AvenueNet-A-PorterNet-A-Porter's ultra-luxe 15-piece advent calendar contains a mix of full- and mini-sized treasures, including beauty products, accessories, and more. Plus, the lantern-shaped box is peppered with twinkling LED lights for a truly showstopping unboxing experience.Shop Net-A-PorterNet-A-Porter The Ultimate Gift Set, $, available at Net-A-PorterFreshThis blockbuster set from Fresh includes all the fan favorites the brand has to offer: Soy Face Cleanser, tinted lip balms, black tea-infused moisturizers, and more.Shop FreshFresh Advent Calendar Skincare Set, $, available at FreshUlta BeautyUlta girlies, this is the advent calendar for you. Inside the pretty gold box, you'll find 24 treasures from brands like Supergoop!, Sunday Riley, Drybar, and Briogeo, among other notable names.Shop Ulta BeautyUlta Beauty 24 Days of Self Care Advent Calendar, $, available at UltaDermstoreFor the skin-care fanatic on your list, you won't find a better gift than Dermstore's advent calendar, bursting at the seams with $765 (!) worth of products from 111Skin, Dr. Loretta, Skin Gym, and more.Dermstore 2022 Advent Calendar, $, available at DermStoreMACMAC never disappoints with its holiday offerings, and they've pulled out all the stops for its 2023 Frosted Frenzy Advent Calendar. Behind all 24 doors, you'll find MAC faves like the new Macstack Mascara, Powder Kiss lipstick, Lipglass, and much more.Shop MACMAC Cosmetics Frosted Frenzy Advent Calendar, $, available at MAC CosmeticsLike what you see? And while it may feel early — after all, Halloween is two months away — that hasn’t deterred brands from releasing some of their big-ticket holiday items. Case in point: Beauty-stuffed advent calendars.

While these blockbuster sets usually come at a premium price point, that's for a few reasons: They tend to be limited in quantity, feature exquisite packaging, and contain myriad products, including full sizes or limited-edition shades. 

All that's to say that the beauty-filled advent calendars you'll find here are not only marvelous to ooh and aah at but also provide a surprisingly good value, given the ample contents inside.
